---
icon: dot
---

# Sign transaction

This module for hashing data

## Main function

---

### signTransaction

```ts
signTransaction(privateKey, unsignedTransaction);
```

Signs a transaction using the given private key.

#### Parameters

1. [!badge variant="warning" text="privateKey"] - [!badge variant="warning" text="string"]: The private key to use for signing the transaction, as a hexadecimal string.
2. [!badge variant="warning" text="unsignedTransaction"] - [!badge variant="warning" text="any"]: The transaction data object containing the parameters of the transaction which receive from server.

#### Returns

[!badge variant="danger" text="Object"]: An object containing the message hash and raw signed transaction of the transaction.

- messageHash - string - The message hash of the signed transaction.
- rawTransaction - string - The raw signed transaction as a hexadecimal string.

#### Example

```ts
signTransaction(
  "0x348ce564d427a3311b6536bbcff9390d69395b06ed6c486954e971d960fe8709",
  {
    to: "0x4390CDBBdf5ACD2c45906fF8eB3a051Bb83e5DBB",
    from: "0x2DB04a470E7058D8b0F3caf650127e538E6907e6",
    gas: 0x43aab,
    gasPrice: 0x00,
    nonce: 10,
    data: "",
  }
).then(console.log);
> {
  messageHash: "0x6d2befdc620761b76e8e4d4f9de3f7c4e4b8d7e45f5deedf7c5860cf8f9e1d9a",
  rawTransaction: "0xf86a8086d55698372431831e848094f0109fc8df283027b6285cc889f5aa624eac1d5ba5f70a08a4190d314dfc2f8b8a0ec0bf9708b5c5f07bba25e3445b5d3e3f764c86941bcdc0018080",
}

```
